Let's imagine I have a collection of information that can contain
arbitrary=
 numbers of types of data.

I want to only get N certain types out of this =
collection (and I want
to get them versioned specifically eg type1v1 type2v=
2 type3v1)

I can think of a few ways of modelling this the main would be t=
o just
go to the list. My initial idea is to use accept to define what they=

are but this feels a bit odd.

Anyone have any ideas?

Greg
